description: This stunning Godfrey model townhome in Leesburg's desirable Crescent Place features an open-concept main level with soaring ceilings, hardwood floors, an upgraded kitchen with granite island and stainless appliances, plus a private balcony and cozy gas fireplace. The luxurious primary suite boasts tray ceilings, a versatile bump-out area, two walk-in closets, and a spa-like ensuite bathroom with dual vanities, soaking tub, and separate shower. Located steps from historic downtown Leesburg, the W&OD Trail, and countless dining and entertainment options, with easy access to major routes and a private rear-entry garage.
